guest_info.name: Kiki Palmer
guest_info.title: Real Estate Agent
guest_info.production_level: $2.3M in closed sales and under contract sales volume this year
guest_info.specialty: Transitioning from dual career to full-time real estate

main_topics: Transitioning from dual career to full-time real estate
Building and managing a real estate database

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Limited lead sources focusing mainly on SOI and referrals
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Develop multiple lead pipelines and leverage virtual assistants for cold calling

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Lack of a structured follow-up system for referrals
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Implement a system for asking and following up on referrals consistently

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Need for a structured approach to budgeting and financial tracking
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Use a red light/green light budget system and track ROI on lead sources

target_avatars.relevance: This episode is relevant for agents looking to transition from part-time to full-time real estate.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on diversifying lead sources and implementing structured systems for follow-up and referrals.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: The consistency and the long play actually works.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the importance of consistency in real estate success.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Why consistency is your secret weapon in real estate.

key_tactics.tactic: Use a virtual assistant for cold calling
key_tactics.context: To overcome reluctance in making cold calls and expand lead generation efforts.

key_tactics.tactic: Implement a red light/green light budget system
key_tactics.context: To evaluate the effectiveness of lead generation expenditures and stop non-performing investments.

quotable_insights: Become their dream maker by knowing their dreams.

resources_mentioned.name: Ninja Selling
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended for personal growth and improving real estate skills.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: For generating more business through effective lead conversion and CRM.

episode_summary: This episode of 'Keeping It Real' features Kiki Palmer, a Chicago-based real estate agent, discussing her transition from a dual career to full-time real estate. The conversation focuses on lead generation strategies, time management, and building a robust client database. Coach Brent Scott provides actionable insights on improving productivity and profitability in real estate.
